title: Is Ahri still any good?
body:
Could anyone who's played her in the latest patch tell me if she's still good?

I honestly thought she would go to Urgot Tier after the nerfs but I've been seeing her a bit still.

replies.body: And do you guys feel like Maxing W second is still better? Or would you all Max Charm second now?
Lol yep she is still very strong right now for ranked I have 100% win ratio. But its not only the champ it's how you play too.
Just gotta manage your mana more. Otherwise it's pretty much the same Ahri.
Ahri is still one of the strongest midlaners after the "nerfs" which are more like buffs

> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oUGgQoan,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-02-21T11:23:21.110+0000)
>
> Ahri is still one of the strongest midlaners after the "nerfs" which are more like buffs

The last patch gave her nothing that could be translated into buffs. Apart from some quality of life changes to her W
Sorry I wasn't talking bout last patch but she's still really strong
More mana management required is the only thing, otherwise she is still ahri.

well i loved her before any tweaks and stuff but now not so much 

i find her a lot more hard to play not sure why just my thoughts

Ahri is Ahri.
Never a bad pick.
When i've played against her she is still strong, i wouldn't say urgot tier but she is weaker than before DFG was removed. I would play her if ur wanting to
